reviews.text: Sunset is OK! The staff are friendly and you're right on the beach in the midst of all the action so location is perfect.  They'll rent you a scooter for 200Rs a day and have wifi (not the best) in the restaurant.
reviews.title: OK stay...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The bed was probably the hardest bed I slept on during my 7 weeks in India. The room was extremely basic and smelled really damp and musty. This may have been because they had just opened after the monsoon though. Also, this was the only place I stayed in that didn't provide a mosquito net in Goa.
reviews.title: great value for money

reviews.text: The walls could do with a lick of paint but you get what you pay for, it was a snip for Anjuna at 600Rs a night.
reviews.title: Ignore the family that runs the place and you should be good to go

reviews.text: Although we have never stayed here as we have our own accomodation we have been using the restuarant for over 10 years and several of our freinds have stayed here.
reviews.title: HEAVEN NEAR HELL(ish)
